title: Komi-san wa Komyushou Desu. - Komi-san wa, H Mousoushou desu. (Doujinshi)
description:
Shouko Komi wants to make friends, but she’s dummy shy and can’t communicate in front of others. One day, she comes across a magazine of ill refute, which talks about making friends with benefits. 

Eager to learn how to become a friend with a benefit, Komi hears her friend Tadano come in...
